Agentskills Demonstration
==============================
Available Skills:
- addition-skill: Performs addition of two numbers
- subtraction-skill: Performs subtraction of two numbers

Demonstration:
5 + 3 = 8
10 - 4 = 6

Skills loaded from:
- skills/addition_skill.md
- skills/subtraction_skill.md

Skill format follows the standard Agent Skills specification with YAML metadata.
